name: Relayality
description:
HTML can be crusty. Try downloading for buttery-smooth performance and less sfx lag! All art, code, music, design, etc by me.

WASD to move. Try floating.

Arrow keys to aim. Try spinning.

Space/Z to attack. Your attack sends enemies and objects somewhere else. Perhaps you can use that for something.

made in 7 days for the i want to make a game in 7 days reason. i took a break to ride my bicycle a few times but I think that's okay, I enjoyed the time greatly.
